summary: This is a customization for Categorized Favorites Menu for warriors who never use magic.
descriptionHtml:
===========================================================================
Warrior Dragonborn Favorites Menu
===========================================================================


This is a customization for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url] for warriors 
who never use magic.


===========================================================================
Installation
===========================================================================

Download CategorizedFavoritesMenu v0_1_8 from the link above
Extract in the Data/Interface folder
Overwrite with my cfg file


===========================================================================
More info
===========================================================================

I strongly recommend you use the 0.1.8.0 version of the .swf file from
 Categorized Favorites Menu because I don`t know what newer versions will 
change and my .cfg might not work with them.


===========================================================================
Uninstallation
===========================================================================

Delete favoritesmenu.swf and favoritesmenu.cfg from the game folder.


===========================================================================
Credits
===========================================================================

favmenumodder for making Categorized Favorites Menu.
Bethesda for creating Skyrim, and skyrimnexus for creating this forum.
author: KICKER
